'''Before Sun and Moon''' is a Quest Item obtained through completing the World Quest [[Antigonus]].

It is handed in at the end of the sub-quest [[Collection of Dragons and Snakes]], after which it can be interacted with to unlock Vol. 2 in [[The Byakuyakoku Collection]].
